receive.message:
PUT /xcap/test-auid1/users/sip:user@hp.com/doc.xml HTTP/1.1 Content-type: application/note+xml;charset=UTF-8 X-XCAP-Asserted-Identity: "sip:user@hp.com" User-Agent: Seagull-gull.sourceforge.net Host: clever5:8090 Accept: text/html, image/gif, *; q=.2, */*; q=.2 Connection: keep-alive
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <note xmlns:dog="the:namespace:for:dog"> <dog:to>Jani</dog:to> <from>Tove</from> <heading>Re: Reminder</heading> <body>I will not forget you this week end!</body> </note>
